metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44855 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.5, 1.36.x before 1.36.3, and 1.37.x before 1.37.1. There is Blind Stored XSS via a URL to the Upload Image feature.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-44855` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.35.5-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.35.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.35.5-1').
